replies.body:
These types of requests are handled via our [@RiotSupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) Twitter team or by submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
